column5: Anyone want to help me find a good lake to catch some whitefish on other than simcoe pm me.  Im lookin at zome 11 but anywhere within 2 hours of alliston im cool with. Heck if you want to split the gas with me i will drive
You'll be looking long and hard to find another whitefish factory like Simcoe within 2hrs of Alliston.  She'll be locked up soon enough.
I'm going to try out Boshkung Lake. I'll post how I do.
I've heard that Restoule is pretty good for the whities....might be out of your 2 hour range....but not by much
When are you going to Boshkung? I heard it's not safe yet.
This weekend. Just talked to the motel. Good to go at their location.
Have you tried Big Caribou Lake.....
We used to catch whitefish in the harbours at Meaford and Owen Sound. I know Owen Sound is open but I wonder if Meaford is fishable.  Collingwood??? Dan O.
Here is the MNR on-line fishing map that they brought out last year.  Fish ON-Line
Thanks for all the replies guys.
I heard Clear Lake just north of Lake Joseph has whities, never tried myself but worth looking into..
Send me a pm I'm from tottenham. Maybe we can get out .
How did you make out woodsman?

Fishing was pretty slow. Only fished Saturday. Marking lots of fish but few biters. Others around me report the same thing. I got one laker at 40cm. When jigging the fish would come up to look at the jig but only 2 light taps on jigs. Tried many types of jigs with the same results. The one I caught came off a minnow on the bottom & it was a very lite hit. Where I was had about 8" of good ice.
